messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Captainssship isss not forced on anyone

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please remember to complete the station goal, the DNA vault. Enjoy your shifts.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: To all staff that did not here the announcement about the DNA vault, here is the command report: "Special Orders for Space Station 13:Our long term prediction systems indicate a 99% chance of system-wide cataclysm in the near future. We need you to construct a DNA Vault aboard your station. The DNA Vault needs to contain samples of: 20 unique animal data 30 unique non-standard plant data 7 unique sapient humanoid DNA data Base vault parts are available for shipping via cargo."

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: How is the DNA vault coming along? If you need any assistance we can provide it within reason.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.
